price: Kad budu u njega bačeni, hučanje njegovo čut će, i on će ključati,
arabic: إِذَآ أُلۡقُواْ فِيهَا سَمِعُواْ لَهَا شَهِيقٗا وَهِيَ تَفُورُ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: idhā ul'qū fīhā samiʿū lahā shahīqan wahiya tafūru
